TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6,T7> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`7<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2, 'T3, 'T4, 'T5, 'T6, 'T7> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

summary.span: 表示 7 元组，即七元组。

span.span: Represents a 7-tuple, or septuple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示7元组, 即七元组, 它是具有七个分量的元组。The class represents a 7-tuple, or septuple, which is a tuple that has seven components. 可以通过调用或静态方法来实例化对象。You can instantiate a object by calling either the or the static method. 您可以使用只读、 、 、、、和实例属性检索元组组件的值。 You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , , , , and instance properties. 元组通常以四种不同的方式使用:Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示单个数据集。To represent a single set of data. 例如, 元组可以表示数据库记录, 并且其组件可以表示记录的各个字段。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供对数据集的轻松访问和操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义一个对象, 该对象包含从1950到2000的每个人口普查的纽约人口数据。The following example defines a object that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1950 through 2000. 七元组传递给`ComputePopulationChange`方法, 该方法用于计算 censuses 之间的年变化率, 以及整个60年的年变化率。The septuple is passed to the `ComputePopulationChange` method, which calculates the annual rate of change between censuses, as well as the annual rate of change for the entire 60 year period. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 从方法返回多个值, 而不使用`out`参数 (在中C#) 或`ByRef`参数 (在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如, 上一个示例在对象中返回其计算统计信息以及城市名称。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要通过单个参数向方法传递多个值, 则为。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如, 该方法只有一个参数, 该参数使你可以为启动时线程执行的方法提供一个值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供对象作为方法参数, 则可以为线程的启动例程提供七个数据项。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread's startup routine with seven items of data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用静态方法来实例化7元组对象, 而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can use the static method to instantiate a 7-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法来实例化一个7元组, 该元组的第一个组件为类型, 其剩余的组件为类型。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 7-tuple whose first component is of type and whose remaining components are of type . [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#13)] 这等效于对类构造函数的以下调用。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在`obj`下列条件下, 参数被视为等于当前实例:The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是一个对象。It is a object. - 它的七个组件的类型与当前实例相同。Its seven components are of the same types as the current instance. - 它的七个组件等于当前实例的组件。Its seven components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个 sextuples 数组, 其中包含从1950到2000的洛杉矶和纽约的人口数据。The following example defines an array of sextuples that contain population data for Los Angeles and New York from 1950 to 2000. 每个七元组的第一个分量标识市县。The first component of each septuple identifies the city. 第一个、第三个和第四个 septuples 包含纽约的数据。The first, third, and fourth septuples contain data for New York. 第一个七元组是第四个七元组的副本。The first septuple is a duplicate of the fourth septuple. 第三个七元组将城市标识为 "纽约市", 而不是 "纽约"。The third septuple identifies the city as "New York City" instead of "New York". 如示例所示, 只有第四个七元组等于第一个七元组。As the example shows, only the fourth septuple is equal to the first septuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item1 As T1
public: property T1 Item1 { T1 get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从该数组中检索由其方法返回的第一个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象数组, 这些对象的组件包含来自1950到2000的三个美国城市 (纽约、芝加哥和洛杉矶) 的人口数据。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain population data for three U.S. cities (New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles) from 1950 through 2000. 然后, 它会显示一个列出数据的表。It then displays a table that lists the data. 若要显示 city 名称, 它将检索每个 对象的属性值。To display the city name, it retrieves the value of the property for each object. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从其方法返回的数组中检索第二个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象数组, 这些对象的组件包含来自1950到2000的三个美国城市 (纽约、芝加哥和洛杉矶) 的人口数据。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain population data for three U.S. cities (New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles) from 1950 through 2000. 然后, 它会显示一个列出数据的表。It then displays a table that lists the data. 若要显示1950中的人口, 它将检索每个 对象的属性值。To display the population in 1950, it retrieves the value of the property for each object. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法允许您定义对象的自定义比较。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如, 您可以使用此方法根据特定组件的值对对象进行排序。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 尽管可以直接调用此方法, 但它最常由包含参数的集合排序方法调用, 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如, 它由方法和使用构造函数实例化的对象的方法调用。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等, 则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组, 其中包含三个美国城市的人口数据 (从1950到 2000)。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1950 to 2000. 七元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The septuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示从1950到2000的10年间隔的人口。The remaining five components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1950 to 2000. 类提供一个实现, 该实现允许 septuples 的数组按其任何一个组件进行排序。 `PopulationComparer`The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of septuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 在其构造函数中为`PopulationComparer`类提供了两个值:定义排序顺序的组件的位置, 以及指示是否应按升序或降序对元组对象进行排序的值。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 然后, 该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中的元素, 按第三个组件 (1960 中的人口) 对它们进行排序并显示它们, 然后将它们按第六个组件 (由1990填充) 进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1960) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 1990) and displays them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当其他项不`null`是, 并且可以成功地将其转换 (在中C#) 或转换 (在 Visual Basic 中) 到其组件与当前实例相同的类型的对象时, 才会调用实现。The implementation is called only if other is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法首先 传递要与实现进行比较的对象的值。 The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`, 将再次调用方法并传递两个对象的值。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续, 直到方法`false`调用在比较特定`Item`对值时返回, 或将两个值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of `Item` values, or the two values are passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`RateComparer`一个类, 该类执行用于相等性的自定义测试。The following example defines a `RateComparer` class that performs a custom test for equality. 如果传递到其方法的值的类型为或, 则方法通过使用最多三个小数位来测试是否相等。If the values that are passed to its method are of type or , the method tests for equality by using only up to three fractional digits. 否则, 它只是调用`x`参数的`Equals`方法。Otherwise, it simply calls the `x` parameter's `Equals` method. 该示例使用此实现来确定是否有四个对象, 这些对象包含有关1950与2000之间的人口变化率的数据是否相等。The example uses this implementation to determine whether four objects that contain data on the rate of population change between 1950 and 2000 are equal. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对比较器对象实现的调用。the method simply wraps a call to the comparer object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个对象返回相同的哈希代码。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供 类的实现。This method provides the implementation for the class. 尽管可以直接调用方法, 但它通常由集合排序方法 (如和) 的默认重载调用, 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等, 则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 此方法使用默认的对象比较器来比较每个组件。This method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组, 其中包含1950到2000美国中三个城市的人口数据。The following example creates an array of objects that contain population data for three cities in the United States from 1950 to 2000. 7个组件由城市名称后接城市人口10年, 从1950到2000。The seven components consist of the city name followed by the city's population at 10-year intervals from 1950 to 2000. 该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件, 对数组进行排序, 然后调用方法以按排序顺序显示每个元组。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls the method to display each tuple in sorted order. 输出显示数组已按名称排序, 这是第一个组件。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意, 该示例不会直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array.
